Row.Text: Shawnee Unique Improvement. +4 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food. +1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for each adjacent [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource. Ageless. Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement on Vegetated Terrain, and cannot be placed adjacent to another Mawaskawe Skote.

Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement on Vegetated Terrain, and cannot be placed adjacent to another Mawaskawe Skote.[n]Shawnee Unique Improvement.

+4 [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence. +3 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science and +2 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on all [icon:CITY_RURAL] Unique Improvements in this Settlement. Ageless. Must be placed in Grassland.
+3 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science and +2 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on all [icon:CITY_RURAL] Unique Improvements in this Settlement.[N]Must be placed in Grassland.
"Our Creator sang to us in the wind and the running water, in the bird songs, in children's laughter, and taught us music."
